short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Facebook and other web tracking events, letting you browse the web safer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook tracks nearly everywhere you go using their analytics and associates your account in aggregated data. This stops Facebook from knowing where you've been and what you've done by blocking analytics requests. It also blocks other unnecessary analytics/tracking requests, saving you the bandwidth, memory, and CPU needed to carry out those requests.
